original_text: The third commander, for the third month, was Benaiah, the son of Jehoiada the chief priest; in his division were 24,000.
korean_text: 셋째 달 군대의 셋째 지휘관은 대제사장 여호야다의 아들 브나야요 그의 반에 이만 사천 명이라

sentences.original_text: The third commander, for the third month, was Benaiah
sentences.korean_translation: 세 번째 달의 세 번째 지휘관은 베나야였습니다

sentences.original_text: the son of Jehoiada the chief priest
